```{r}
library(tidyverse)


ds <- read_csv("MLB pitch_tempo.csv")

head(ds, 5)
names(ds)
```

```{r}
ds %>% mutate(ratio_empty =  total_pitches_empty / total_pitches...5,
              ratio_onbase = total_pitches_onbase / total_pitches...5,
              empty_pitchTime =  ratio_empty * median_seconds_empty...8,
              onbase_pitchTime = ratio_onbase * median_seconds_empty...8,) %>%
  select(entity_id, entity_name, empty, onbase) %>%
  mutate(status_empty = ifelse(empty_pitchTime < 15, 0, 1),
         status_onbase = ifelse(onbase_pitchTime < 15, 0, 1)) %>%
  select(-entity_id)

```
